dashboard.noTips: Customized tips will be provided after analyzing your data.

tips.tip1: Keep your neck straight and pull your shoulders back.
tips.tip2: Adjust your monitor to eye level.
tips.tip4: Sit with your back fully against the chair.
tips.tip5: Keep your feet flat on the floor.

dashboard.chartDesc: Changes in posture score over the last 6 days.

motivation.good: Good try! Let's pay a little more attention.
motivation.bad: Consciously correct your posture and raise your score!

about.feature2: Detects turtle neck and shoulder misalignment
about.step1Desc: Connect your webcam and allow permissions in the monitoring tab.
about.step2Desc: Turn on monitoring to start real-time posture analysis.
about.step3Desc: Follow notifications and tips to maintain good posture.

settings.cameraGuide: If the camera does not work, click the button below to allow app camera access in system settings.
settings.batterySavingModeDesc: When enabled, changes monitoring interval to minutes and operates camera in saving mode.
settings.monitoringIntervalDesc: Set the time interval for posture analysis.
settings.notificationFrequencyDescNormal: Set how many detections out of the last 3 will trigger a notification.
settings.notificationFrequencyDescBatterySaving: Fixed to 1 time in battery saving mode.
settings.turtleNeckSensitivityDesc: Set how strictly turtle-neck posture is detected.
settings.shoulderSensitivityDesc: Set how strictly shoulder asymmetry is detected.
settings.notificationGuide: If notifications do not arrive, click the button below to allow app notification permissions in system settings.
settings.updateGuide: Check for new versions and install updates automatically.
settings.updateInstalled: Update installed. Please restart the app.
settings.cameraErrorGetList: Error getting camera list from backend:
settings.cameraErrorSetSelected: Error setting selected camera in backend:

settings.cameraPermissionDirect: Please allow app permissions directly in System Settings > Privacy & Security > Camera.
settings.notificationPermissionManual: Please allow app permissions directly in System Settings > Notifications.
settings.notificationPermissionDirect: Unable to open settings window. Please manually go to System Settings > Notifications to check permissions.
